thread.title: Former UConn Basketball Stars Getting Ready For The Season - Hartford Courant

author: courant.com
title: Former UConn Basketball Stars Getting Ready For The Season - Hartford Courant
text:
Caption Andre Drummond Duane Burleson / Associated Press Detroit Pistons' Andre Drummond (0) knocks the ball away from Charlotte Hornets’ Spencer Hawes (00) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich. The Hornets defeated the Pistons 99-94.  
Detroit Pistons' Andre Drummond (0) knocks the ball away from Charlotte Hornets’ Spencer Hawes (00) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich. The Hornets defeated the Pistons 99-94.  
(Duane Burleson / Associated Press) See more galleries Caption Andre Drummond Duane Burleson / Associated Press Detroit Pistons' Andre Drummond (0) goes to the basket past Charlotte Hornets’ Cody Zeller (40) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich.  
Detroit Pistons' Andre Drummond (0) goes to the basket past Charlotte Hornets’ Cody Zeller (40) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Auburn Hills, Mich.  
(Duane Burleson / Associated Press) See more galleries The members of the UConn men's basketball fraternity currently on NBA rosters are busily getting ready for the start of the regular season. Here's a collection of 2015 preseason action. Unfortunately Caron Butler was the lone club member without a photo from 2015 preseason so a shot from the 2014 regular season is included.
This photo gallery is featured in these articles: UConn Men's Basketball Insider UConn Men's Basketball Insider: Caron Butler's Book A Journey From Bottom To Top UConn Men's Basketball Insider UConn Men's Insider: Sam Cassell's Itching To Go
